name: Word Sequencing
description: Word Sequencing is an educational game about creating sentences. The player is given a list of words in jumbled order and the player's task is to reorder these so that the right phrase is created. The game contains three programs: proverbs, rhymes and sentences. These all work out in the same way but differers in the kind of phrases included. Before starting out it's possible to chose the number of seconds each player should have at hand and the results of up to twenty player can be stored for later recall.
